headline: PTC Launches Arena AI Engine to Accelerate Intelligent Automation Across PLM and QMS Workflows
summary: PTC (NASDAQ: PTC) today announced the release of its Arena® product lifecycle management (PLM) and quality management system (QMS) AI Engine. Powered by Amazon Bedrock, Arena AI Engine functionality automates document review and comparison to enable teams to reduce errors, strengthen compliance, and work through file changes more quickly.
